about_the_game:
Inglobe is a 3D adventure game in which you control a character from a TPS perspective and deliver letters to their destination in a maze-like city.


Game System.
Control your character in full 3D stages and aim for the goal!
As the town's postman, the player is given letters to deliver every day. However, the player does not know where in the town the letter is addressed. Without a map, you must figure out where to deliver their letters, find them, and put them in the right mailboxes in the right buildings.

The key to playing the game is solving the riddles using the “oracle,” an unknown symbol.
By carefully observing the relationship between the symbols on the letter and the symbols on the objects on the stage, you can gradually narrow down the correct destination.

If you successfully deliver the letter to the correct destination, you will be able to progress in the story with the town's inhabitants. At the same time, the stage will undergo surprising changes, making for a more exciting exploration.

Story.
You wake up in a strange building in a strange town. According to the mysterious life form that appears before you, you are a lone postman, working at the post office in a snowy town. The life form tells you that it is dangerous to deliver letters in this town and urges you to throw them away without delivering them. You have no idea what to do, but you have a choice: throw away the letter in front of you, or defy the life form and run off to a strange town to deliver the letter....

Recommended for.
- Enjoy puzzle-mystery games in which the player must deduce the destination of a letter from objects in the town and from conversations with its inhabitants.
- Those who are interested in unpredictable stories with a fantastic world view.
- Those who are confident in time attack to escape from the maze by manipulating 3D characters.

Features of the game experience.
- The game offers a fresh view of the beautiful town.
- Enjoy the fascinating mysteries hidden in the town and interact with the distinctive characters.
- You will be tested on your ability to solve randomly generated mazes like a roguelike dungeon.
